name: UXD Stablecoin
description: UXD Protocol is an algorithmic stablecoin that is fully backed by a delta-neutral position using derivatives. UXD Protocol is non-custodial, and does not hold user's deposited crypto assets. Users can mint/redeem UXD on a permissionless basis.UXD users can mint 1 UXD for $1 worth of crypto assets. UXD does not require any over-collateralization.
